name: Agatha's Witching Hour
description:
A cute and simple game where you must escape a monstrous cat using the music's rhythm.

Agatha, the witch of Pinus, continues her search for power so that she can bypass the spell put by her mother on her spellbook, Deyse, which doesn't let her use the most powerful spells inside it Nya.
Suddenly, she is approached by another time cat (ME nya) with another time rift Nya. Deyse, already knowing our nature as the Timegod's thugs Nya, alerts the Witch to back off Nya. But my speech about a great power inside the rift Nya makes Pinus throw herself inside it without a second thought Nya.
What she wasn't expecting was becoming trapped to movements timed by me Nya hahaha!
Will she find the way out Nya? It doesn't matter Nya! I can stay here having fun for millenia while she dances to the rhythm of my paradox Nyammmm!

Only one finger Nya! Only one movement each beat Nya! Think slowly Nya, think fast Nya! Think nyaaaammmm!
